subject: Create rails/ pack directory with all template files
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Create the full `rails/` directory tree with all template files (~25 files).

See plan file `plans/delightful-napping-lemon.md` Tasks 6 section for complete file list and contents.

Key files:
- `rails/copy-overwrite/CLAUDE.md` — Rails-specific governance (adapt from `all/copy-overwrite/CLAUDE.md`)
- `rails/copy-overwrite/.rubocop.yml` — Governance RuboCop config
- `rails/copy-overwrite/lefthook.yml` — Git hooks
- `rails/copy-overwrite/Gemfile.lisa` — Governance gems with `~>` constraints. IMPORTANT: `strong_migrations` and `rack-attack` outside dev/test group.
- `rails/copy-overwrite/.claude/rules/lisa.md` — Rails-specific managed file list
- `rails/copy-overwrite/.claude/rules/rails-conventions.md` — Rails coding standards
- 5 skill overrides in `rails/copy-overwrite/.claude/skills/plan-*/SKILL.md`
- `rails/copy-contents/Gemfile` — Appends `eval_gemfile "Gemfile.lisa"` with markers
- `rails/create-only/` files: `.rubocop.local.yml`, `.simplecov`, `.reek.yml`, `.rspec`, `sonar-project.properties`, `spec/spec_helper.rb`, `spec/rails_helper.rb`, `.github/workflows/quality.yml`
- `rails/deletions.json` — `{"paths":[".overcommit.yml"]}`

Reference `all/copy-overwrite/.claude/skills/plan-*/SKILL.md` for JS originals to adapt.
Reference plan sections "Key Template Contents" for exact content of `.rubocop.yml`, `lefthook.yml`, `Gemfile.lisa`, `Gemfile`.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All files created with correct content
- [ ] `Gemfile.lisa` has `strong_migrations` and `rack-attack` outside dev/test group
- [ ] All gems have `~>` version constraints
- [ ] `lefthook.yml` has RuboCop + bundler-audit in pre-commit, rspec + brakeman in pre-push
- [ ] `quality.yml` has explicit `permissions:` block
- [ ] 5 skill overrides correctly adapt JS commands to Ruby equivalents

**Verification:**
```json
{"plan":"delightful-napping-lemon","type":"task","skills":[],"verification":{"type":"manual-check","command":"find rails/ -type f | sort | wc -l && grep 'strong_migrations' rails/copy-overwrite/Gemfile.lisa | head -1","expected":"~25 files, strong_migrations outside group block"}}
```

Skill overrides map ESLint commands to RuboCop equivalents: format json, --only cop flags, flog for complexity
